text:
Using revision 1.29 of class org.apache.coyote.Response there is a problem with 
default charset encoding.
In particular with PDF's generated by our application.
you can see a complete thread at http://tomcat.junlu.com/msg/6063_14533.html 
This problem was fixes using revision 1.30 but using revision 1.31 the problem 
occurs again.
Thank You
Roberto
creator: robertotest@email.it

text: This is not the case. You have made a mistake somewhere.
creator: remm@apache.org
